mapper.select: SELECT u.userNo, u.name AS userName, u.birth AS userBirth, u.tel AS userTel, u.gender AS userGender, u.email AS userEmail, u.id AS userId, u.pw AS userPw, u.refundAccount AS userRefundAccount, g.userGradeNo AS userGradeUserGradeNo, g.grade AS userGradeGrade FROM user u LEFT JOIN userGrade g ON u.userGradeNo = g.userGradeNo;
